attributes.action: Temporary freeze of paye tax for NHS/keyworkers
attributes.additional_details: NHS and supermarket workers are putting their lives on the line for the country during the coronavirus lockdown risking their families and loved 1s to the virus whilst people sat at home doing nothing are still getting taxed exactly the same amount for not working
attributes.background: All NHS and supermarket workers /delivery drivers should be untaxed whilst the lockdown is in progress

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
